modName: Kathlyn Save Face Preset for ECE
summary: Add a beauty face preset for ECE
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][u]NOTE:
[/u][/b]
English isnt my native language, so sorry for my poor
If you want your character the same with my screenshoots then follow my recommend mod and load order (M.O User)
[b]Result depend on skin type you choose[/b] (Fair Skin Complexion, Real Girl Realistic Body, SG Female Textures Renewal...

[u]REQUIREMENTS:
[/u]-[b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]Enhance Character Edit[/url][/b]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15438/?]Kawai Face Preset[/url]
-[b]
[/b]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]
- Brow Highresolution
-[b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]Eyes Of Aber[/url][/b] or/and[b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]Mikan Eyes[/url] o[/b]r/and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60111/?]Cherry Eyes[/url][b]
[/b]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/689/?][b]Detailed Lip[/b][/url]
- [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion v7.9[/url][/b] or [b]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for [url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/31227-real-girls-realistic-body-texture-for-cbbe/]CBBE[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]UNP UNPB 7B[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641/?]Ravens Warpaint[/url]

[/b][b][u]INSTALL:
[/u][/b]Unrar my file and simply copy file "[b]_6_commonTriRaces.slot[/b]" then paste into C:\Users\(Your User Name)\My Documents\My Games\Skyrim\cme_save\
Then enter your game, type "showracemenu" to enter character edit menu , go to Body Tab>Slot Load> Choose Slot 6
If you have used slot 6 before, then back up that slot before replace my file or Right click choose rename to re-number my file from 1-25...whatever you want

Armor i'm used in screenshots:
- [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/222-something-wicked/]Something Wicked[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?]Emfy Cleric Robes UNP CBBE[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?]KS Jewelry

[/url][/size]
author: infinitywolf1
